my_module module¶

class my_module.Calculator¶

Bases: object

A simple calculator class to perform basic operations.

Methods¶

add(a, b)

Adds two numbers.

subtract(a, b)

Subtracts second number from first number.

multiply(a, b)

Multiplies two numbers.

divide(a, b)

Divides first number by second number. Raises ZeroDivisionError for division by zero.

add(a, b)¶

Returns the sum of a and b.

divide(a, b)¶

Returns the quotient of a divided by b.

Raises¶

ZeroDivisionError

If b is 0.

multiply(a, b)¶

Returns the product of a and b.

subtract(a, b)¶

Returns the difference when b is subtracted from a.

Calculator
